!Master Gideon: Please choose one of the following three types of crystals: [Quest _350_EnhanceYourWeapon 30856-09.htm|Red Soul Crystal] [Quest _350_EnhanceYourWeapon 30856-10.htm|Green Soul Crystal] [Quest _350_EnhanceYourWeapon 30856-11.htm|Blue Soul Crystal] Each crystal bestows a different power upon the weapon it enhances, and the powers may vary from weapon to weapon.
